businessRules.statement: If you filter by clinic before clicking Add Appointment, the related dropdown lists (Department, Clinic, Service, Doctor) will be automatically populated accordingly.

userStories.name: End an Appointment and Update Patient Records

businessRules.statement: The service is provided by the clinic regardless of the doctor, and the same service can be provided by more than one clinic.
When defining a service, it is assigned to a clinic, and the doctors who will provide this service are specified (name, specialty, doctor).
Appointments are scheduled according to the clinic working hours, and the clinic working hours are based on the complex working hours.
When creating any facility, there must be the ability to add more than one phone number.
Only one image can be selected for a doctor, staff member, and patient.
Remove the Job Title from the doctor details.
The specialty appears only in the doctor details and does not appear in the clinic details because it has no impact on it.
When a user requests to change the password, the admin grants them a link to set the new password.
All system permissions must be documented in the Roles sheet.
Remove the ID from all facilities and keep only the user ID and patient ID.

When creating a new user account, the admin enters the basic information. If important required data is missing, the user is redirected on first login to a complete profile page to fill in the missing details before accessing the system.
When adding a clinic, there must be at least one available doctor.
A notification is sent when a doctor's certificate is about to expire.
Provide a path to allow adding a patient while booking an appointment.
